original_text: Thus he shall make atonement for the Holy Place, because of the uncleannesses of the people of Israel and because of their transgressions, all their sins. And so he shall do for the tent of meeting, which dwells with them in the midst of their uncleannesses.
korean_text: 곧 이스라엘 자손의 부정과 그들이 범한 모든 죄로 말미암아 지성소를 위하여 속죄하고 또 그들의 부정한 중에 있는 회막을 위하여 그같이 할 것이요

sentences.original_text: Thus he shall make atonement for the Holy Place
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 그는 성소를 위하여 속죄할 것이니

sentences.original_text: because of the uncleannesses of the people of Israel
And so he shall do for the tent of meeting
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 회막을 위하여 또한 그렇게 할 것이니

sentences.original_text: in the midst of their uncleannesses
